heading: PS00422
0:
Shipment Of 51 Container Vans Of Garbage From South Korea To The Port Of Tagoloan, Misamis Oriental;
Re: House Resolution No.02317 - Illegal Entry And Dumping Of Hazardous Plastic Garbage From South Korea In The P H I V I D E C Industrial Estate In Tagoloan, Misamis Oriental

House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00422
FULL TITLE :
